pr_title: GH-1852: support Repositories#tupleQuery in FedX repository

timeline.message:
GH-1852: support Repositories#tupleQuery in FedX repository

This change adjusts the implementations of #begin(), #commit() and
#rollback() to not throw an Exception, but rather do nothing.

Thus we now can use the Repositories#tupleQuery convenience function

timeline.bodyText: No need to fix in this PR, but you may want to look at your template and update the year.
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: Done, I adjusted my template. Thanks for paying attention
replies.author: aschwarte10
